page.title: 05POLICE STATION, SWADLICOTE
page.content: As you walk into Swadlincote police station on{Civic Way}you see 2 notice boards in the reception area if you ring a bell a{P.C.}or a{W.P.C.}comes to you. The police have a number of panda & patrol cars. The Swadlincote station alone has 5 cars. 3 Metros, 1 Astra & a Rover. They employ 44 people mostly men. The {highest rank}is an inspector whose name is Webster. The main causes of emergency calls are theft and domestic problems. Policemen/women get a medal for 20 years service. The{C.I.D.}work there too.The police go into schools quite often to show films & give talks about road saftey or going off with strangers. They also give advice about how to help prevent crime, by locking car doors, bolting windows & so on.
